Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory229.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Under the flickering aurora, she lets the cold wind mixed with frost and snow beat on her body and looks ahead.'}
{3: 'Nightfall drapes over the snowy forest in a thin veil of endless darkness.'}
{3: 'She clenches her spear tightly in the blistering cold as she looks out at the dim red lights illuminating the forest like fireflies.'}
{3: 'Lift. Aim. Throw. Her many battles had honed this skill into one powerful, fluid motion.'}
{3: 'With each throw of her spear, the dim red lights drastically reduce in number.'}
{3: 'However, many more still remain. The mechanoid creatures cloaked in darkness rush out of the forest and charge the humanoid hybrid girl standing in the middle of the snowfield.'}
{3: 'Aside from the frigid wind, she is only accompanied by rows of spears standing at the ready.'}
{3: 'She lifts up a spear from the snow, raises her front legs, then stomps on the ground with a heavy thud. The force from the impact sends a wave of snow billowing forward as it falls down.'}
{3: 'Snow plasters her frame in the harsh wind, giving her armor a lustrous silver sheen.'}
{3: 'The mechanoid creatures lay scattered on the ground, mottling the snowfield with their ink-black remains.'}
{3: 'Before her, the rampaging mechanoids roar as if to devour all in their path.'}
{3: 'Behind her, the faint flame of humanity glitters as smoke rises from the camp.'}
{3: 'Following the lamenting cry of the last mechanoid, she plunges her spear back into the ground.'}
{3: 'Rosetta and her spear have become an insurmountable gorge for the enemy.'}
{3: 'Over what felt like countless years, this has been the day-to-day routine for the Forest Guard here in the snowfield—a battlefield for Rosetta to wander alone.'}
{3: 'Under the night sky, Rosetta returns her gaze ahead once more.'}
{3: 'What she sees is a new dawn, or perhaps the approaching dusk.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory231.png'}
{3: 'As the confrontation gradually settles, Murmansk welcomes a long-lost peace.'}
{3: 'The reconstruction of the port is carried out in an orderly manner with all hands on deck. Naturally, the Forest Guard joins in the reconstruction efforts.'}
{3: 'Working in teams, they vigorously transport building materials around the port on their backs in loads far beyond humanly possible.'}
{3: 'A humanoid Construct is seen walking among the Forest Guard, which seems peculiar to outsiders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forest Guard A', 3: 'Rosetta, let us carry your load.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's nothing. After all, I'm already carrying way less than you because of my humanoid frame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Don't worry. Go on without me. We have to stay on schedule.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guard A', 3: "Um... Okay. We'll proceed to the destination.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The humanoid hybrid guard nods to Rosetta before galloping and leaving.'}
{3: 'She quickly disappears out of view. Rosetta tightens her grip around the materials on her shoulders and trudges toward the destination.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: "After completing today's reconstruction work, Rosetta returns to the camp only to discover that neither her companions nor their weapons are to be found."}
{3: 'Sensing the Punishing Virus looming in the air, she subconsciously grips her spear.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The familiar mechanical creatures dart by outside the camp. The spear in Rosetta's hand quickly transforms and begins to surge with electric energy at its tip."}
{3: "Her comrade's sudden shout stops her in her tracks."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...They're out of range.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The condensed energy at the tip of the spear disperses. Rosetta holsters her spear and gives chase.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forest Guard A', 3: 'Dammit... They got away.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'What happened?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guard A', 3: 'We found Corrupted tracks nearby when we returned to camp. Our comrades have split up and are hunting them down.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forest Guard A', 3: "But it's not going as smoothly.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Rosetta takes a step forward to scan the surrounding area.'}
{3: 'She focuses her gaze on a low-lying branch.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Did you just come from there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guard A', 3: 'Huh? No.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{3: 'After hearing this and checking her surroundings, Rosetta motions for her to step back before raising her spear and unleashing a concentrated blast of electric energy in the direction of the branch.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The blast obliterates most of the Corrupted. However, the Corrupted drags the remnants of its shell as it roars and charges at Rosetta.'}
{3: 'Right as Rosetta lifts her spear to follow up her attack, another spear comes flying out of the forest and pins the Corrupted against a tree stump.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Hehe, you got slow, Rosetta.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "You're not wrong. This frame focuses on firepower at the expense of mobility.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Your wounds...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Don't worry about it. A few cuts and bruises are nothing to us. Fortunately, we cleared out all of the surrounding Corrupted.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Rosetta looks at her comrades. Each member's frame shows signs of injury."}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Hmm? What's wrong? Why so serious, Rosetta?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's nothing. I'll lead everyone back to camp to get some rest.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: 'After tending to her wounded comrades, Diana reports the situation to the port residents while the others return to the reconstruction team.'}
{3: 'Seeing the orderly procession of comrades before her, Rosetta makes her way out of the camp.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory229.png'}
{3: 'What she sees is a new dawn, or perhaps the approaching dusk.'}
{3: 'She drags her injured body back to camp. The image of her comrades resting, their condition now stabilized, is branded in her M.I.N.D.'}

{3: 'Like a knight guarding her comrades, she had selflessly completed her mission and protected them once more. A warm current surges through her body, expelling the coldness she suffered from during the previous battle.'}
{3: 'She retreats to an isolated corner of the camp to tend to her wounds before the others can notice.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory52.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "How's the situation with the Forest Guard, Diana?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Nothing out of the ordinary.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Everyone misses you. When are you coming back?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll be back once I finish up work with Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Okay. We'll be waiting for you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "You've gotten weaker.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I put my comrades at risk when I was supposed to guard them...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The old Rosetta wouldn't have...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta clenches her fists and reflects on herself.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Have I... gotten weaker...?', 4: '1'}
